channel.title: CVE Feed for EllisLab -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EllisLab -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-0897|2024-08-05T13:25:16.804Z -- ellislab -- expressionengine
item.description: ExpressionEngine version 2.x < 2.11.8 and version 3.x < 3.5.5 create an object signing token with weak entropy. Successfully guessing the token can lead to remote code execution.
